meanings.definition: The necessary items or tools for a particular purpose or activity.
meanings.sent1: The camping equipments were packed neatly in the backpack.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker carried his equipments to the building site.
meanings.sent3: The magician's equipments disappeared along with the rabbit!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the most important equipment in her job as a receptionist.
meanings.sent5: The detective's equipments included a magnifying glass and a notebook.

meanings.definition: The act of providing or supplying with necessary items or tools.
meanings.sent1: The equipment of the soldiers was done efficiently by the quartermaster.
meanings.sent2: The equipment of the new office was completed before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The equipment of the party with balloons and streamers made everyone happy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the best equipment for helping others in need.
meanings.sent5: The equipment of the classroom with new books excited the students.
